EmailTemplate.name: U.S. - Deadline Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Climate Corps Application Due Soon
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{{Recipient.FirstName}}},
Are you ready to be a part of Climate Action by becoming a Climate Corps fellow?
The deadline for Round 1 of the Climate Corps Fellowship application is November 28 at 11:59 pm IST.
We understand that you might be busy fine-tuning your application, and we're here to lend a helping hand with some valuable tips: - Showcase Relevant Experience:Don't forget to highlight any professional work experience, internships, academic coursework, or volunteer engagements that align with the job description of the fellow. - Highlight Relevant Courses:Let us know about any relevant courses you've taken or plan to take in the upcoming months. - Personalize Your Cover Letter: Explain how Climate Corps perfectly aligns with your career interests and reference specific experiences, whether professional or academic, that have prepared you for this fellowship.
Want to learn more about our projects to better determine how your skillset aligns with our work? Visit our Climate Corps Project Database < http://edfclimatecorps.org/projects/results > . You can explore the types of projects our fellows have tackled and see which ones align with your skills.
Still have questions?Email us at edfclimatecorps.apply@edf.org < mailto:edfclimatecorps.apply@edf.org >
Continue Application < https://environmentaldefensefund.my.site.com/EDFCCFellowPortal/s/login/ >
